lyrics:
35 contributorstranslationsportuguêswe’re alive lyricsverse 1
everyone and everything around mes always changing
everyone except me im stayin the same as if i was nothing
i dont sing my songs i bleed them i dont write unless i mean them
without cold the snows just rain without my voice its all the same

chorus
its okay were just scared
its okay were just scared hey
its okay were just scared
its okay were just scared

verse 2
i dont really need to sleep much longer
but the longer i sleep the slower my heart beats
theres fire on my floor telling me to sleep some more
cry a little louder if you know what this means

chorus
its okay were just scared its okay were just scared
its okay were just scared its okay were just scared
its okay were just scared its okay were just scared
its okay were just scared its okay

postchorus
i forgot about the note i left on my back door on my back door
but its alright ill stay here inside with my friends who arent here anymore
see cavetown liveget tickets as low as 86you might also likebridge
actually you know what
the way things are isnt good enough
actually you know what
the way things are isnt good enough
actually you know what
the way things are isnt good enough
actually you know what
the way things are isnt good enough
actually you know what
the way things are isnt good enough

outro
were alive and were here
listen please cause were scared
were alive and were here
we will scream till you hear
were alive and were here
listen please cause were scared
were alive and were here
we will scream till you hear11embed
